page.title: 01KIRTON & FALKENHAM
page.content: The area is mainly agricultural consisting of the eastern part of Kirton village, almost all of Falkenham, part of Trimley St. Martin, Trimley St. Mary and Felixstowe, part of the River deben and part of Ramsholt. The area also has a dormitory area for persons commutting to Felixstowe, Levington, Matlesham, Woodbridge and Ipswich. Attitudes-Caring Arts & craft- Spinning, lace making, Weaving Clubs - Mother & Toddlers, Playgroup, Brownies. Guides, Cubs, Scouts Over 60's, Flower, Bowls, Thursday club, Womens Inst. British Legion Communications- telephone, Postal Ecology-Flora and Fauna Education-Adult classes Energy-Electricity, Gas
